Need To Know
Need To Know


Trump Charges Dropped

The judge overseeing the Jan. 6 election interference case against
President-elect Donald Trump dropped charges
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hYmNuZXdzLmdvL=
mNvbS9VUy9zcGVjaWFsLWNvdW5zZWwtamFjay1zbWl0aC1tb3Zlcy1kaXNtaXNzLWVsZWN0aW9u=
LWludGVyZmVyZW5jZS9zdG9yeT9pZD0xMTYyMDc3NTgmY2lkPXNvY2lhbF90d2l0dGVyX2FiY24=
/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B1b0d9689>
yesterday,
following a request from Special Counsel Jack Smith. Smith similarly moved
to dismiss charges against Trump, accusing him of illegally retaining
classified
documents
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmJjLmNvb=
S9uZXdzL2FydGljbGVzL2N4Mm40eDFwNzBybw/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf35bb4b4>
after leaving office.



In filings (read here
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZG9jdW1lb=
nRjbG91ZC5vcmcvZG9jdW1lbnRzLzI1NDAyNDUzLXRydW1wMTEyNQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8=
397B8f1b9693>),
Smith said his view of the case remained unchanged but cited the Justice
Department's long-standing legal perspective that federal prosecution of a
sitting president is unconstitutional. In the election interference case,
prosecutors alleged Trump conspired to interfere with the 2020 election and
obstruct the official certification of electoral votes (see previous
write-up
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb=
20vbmV3c2xldHRlci90cnVtcC1pbmRpY3RtZW50LWhlbnJpZXR0YS1sYWNrcy1hbmQtYW1lcmlj=
YXMtYmVzdC1ob3NwaXRhbHM/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B36ff27b8>
).



Charges were brought last August, with the trial delayed by a legal
challenge in which the Supreme Court ultimately ruled former presidents hav=
e
some immunity
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuc2NvdHVzY=
mxvZy5jb20vMjAyNC8wNy9qdXN0aWNlcy1ydWxlLXRydW1wLWhhcy1zb21lLWltbXVuaXR5LWZy=
b20tcHJvc2VjdXRpb24v/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B2fa83380>
to criminal prosecution for acts in office. Smith subsequently refiled
updated charges 10 weeks ahead of the election.



In related news, the president-elect said yesterday evening he would look
to impose 25% tariffs
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL=
2FydGljbGUvdHJ1bXAtdGFyaWZmcy1jYW5hZGEtbWV4aWNvLWNoaW5hLTU5MjM5YWZlMTIwMzNj=
YTk5YzY1YzdhMmJlMGU0ZjBk/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B82a35abc>
on all goods coming from Canada and Mexico and additional tariffs on
Chinese goods on his first day back in office.


Israel Weighs Hezbollah Deal

Israel's Cabinet is expected to vote today on the terms of a proposed cease=
fire
deal
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly90aGVoaWxsLmNvb=
S9wb2xpY3kvZGVmZW5zZS81MDA4MTY5LWNlYXNlZmlyZS1kZWFsLWlzcmFlbC1oZXpib2xsYWgv=
/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B81820f07>
with Hezbollah in Lebanon.



The deal=E2=80=94which does not cover the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza=E2=80=94=
would reportedly
include a 60-day Israeli withdrawal from southern Lebanon as Hezbollah
fighters move north of the Litani River (see map
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudW5kZXJzd=
GFuZGluZ3dhci5vcmcvYmFja2dyb3VuZGVyL3VuZGVyc3RhbmRpbmctaXNyYWVsJUUyJTgwJTk5=
cy1jYW1wYWlnbi1kZWZlYXQtaGV6Ym9sbGFoLWxlYmFub24/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B53=
256dc4>).
The Lebanese army would monitor the border in a process overseen by five
countries, led by the US and France. Israel could continue to take military
action to disrupt Hezbollah's ability to smuggle weapons and reestablish a
border presence.



Hezbollah renewed its conflict with Israel
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2ZyLm9yZ=
y9iYWNrZ3JvdW5kZXIvd2hhdC1oZXpib2xsYWg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6a6c0dbd>
on Oct. 8, 2023, launching thousands of rockets into the country following
Hamas' Oct. 7 attacks. Since then, around 60,000 people have been displaced
in Israel and more than 1 million people in Lebanon. Israeli attacks in
Lebanon=E2=80=94including a ground invasion this year=E2=80=94have killed m=
ore than 3,500
people and wounded over 15,000 others; Hezbollah attacks have killed around
140 people in Israel.


Dancing in the Mini Moonlight

Earth=E2=80=99s temporary =E2=80=9Cmini moon,=E2=80=9D
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL=
2FydGljbGUvZWFydGgtbWluaS1tb29uLWFkZmIyMmZhODJhMDFkMTY4YzFiNjYzYWNmMTBlYjky=
/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B06f7d11a>
a 33-foot asteroid known as 2024 PT5, is departing after spending two
months near our planet. The space rock began its horseshoe-shaped path
around Earth in late September but was never fully captured as a true
satellite.



Scientists believe the bus-sized rock may be a chunk of our own moon
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubGl2ZXNja=
WVuY2UuY29tL3NwYWNlL2FzdGVyb2lkcy9lYXJ0aHMtbGF0ZXN0LW1pbmltb29uLWNvdWxkLWJl=
LWEtY2h1bmstb2Ytb3VyLXBsYW5ldHMtcGVybWFuZW50LW1vb24tYW5kLWl0cy1hYm91dC10by1=
sZWF2ZS11cy1iZWhpbmQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf29edb47>
based
on its composition and characteristics, finding its makeup closely matches
lunar samples collected by Russian and NASA missions in the past. The
asteroid's spectral characteristics resemble material from the moon's maria
regions
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXNoYWJsZS5jb=
20vYXJ0aWNsZS9mYXItc2lkZS1kYXJrLW1vb24tZXhwbGFpbmVk/67456a0c2f068d0b710a839=
7Bee6732e1>=E2=80=94dark
lunar areas formed by ancient lava flows=E2=80=94suggesting it may have bee=
n
ejected from a lunar crater millions of years ago.



The asteroid will make a brief reappearance in January, passing within 1.1
million miles of our planet=E2=80=94about five times the distance from Eart=
h to the
moon. After the flyby, it won't return until 2055.

r=E2=80=94meet

languages offered.

Sports, Entertainment, & Culture

*>* *General Motors to join *Formula 1 as its 11th team beginning in 2026
under GM's Cadillac brand (More
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXNwbi5jb=
20vZjEvc3RvcnkvXy9pZC80MjYwNTk0OC9mb3JtdWxhLTEtYXBwcm92ZXMtZ20tMTF0aC10ZWFt=

visualization of the data on America's workers=E2=80=94and the great divide=

tZWRpdW09ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B=
39d36505>
.

*Historybook:* Abolitionist Sojourner Truth
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuaGlzdG9ye=
S5jb20vdG9waWNzL2JsYWNrLWhpc3Rvcnkvc29qb3VybmVyLXRydXRo/67456a0c2f068d0b710=
a8397B479bc11e>
dies
(1883); National Hockey League founded (1917); "Peanuts" creator Charles M.
Schulz born (1922); King Tut=E2=80=99s tomb is uncovered by British archaeo=
logist
Howard Carter (1922); Singer and actress Tina Turner born (1939).

"Life is like a 10-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use."

- Charles M. Schulz

*Why 1440? *The printing press was invented around the year 1440, spreading
knowledge to the masses and changing the course of history. More facts: In
every day, there are 1,440 minutes. We=E2=80=99re here to make each one cou=
nt.



*Send us your feedback at* hello@join1440.com and help us stay as unbiased
as humanly possible. We=E2=80=99re ready to listen.



*Interested in reaching intellectually curious readers like you?* To become
a 1440 partner, apply here
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb=
20vcGFydG5lcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B3608b715>
.

<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:7px;padding-right:20px;padding-bott=
om:5px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Georgia,Times,&quot;Tim=
es New Roman&quot;,serif;font-size:23px;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:normal=
;line-height:32px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p style=3D"paddin=
g:0;margin:0">Trump Charges Dropped</p></div>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:12px;padding-right:20px;padding-bot=
tom:10px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetic=
a Neue&quot;,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;color:rgb(0,0,0);fon=
t-weight:normal;line-height:22px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p =
style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;=
padding:0"><span>The judge overseeing the Jan. 6 election interference case=
 against President-elect Donald Trump <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/=
click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hYmNuZXdzLmdvLmNvbS9VUy9zcGVjaWFsLWNvdW5z=
ZWwtamFjay1zbWl0aC1tb3Zlcy1kaXNtaXNzLWVsZWN0aW9uLWludGVyZmVyZW5jZS9zdG9yeT9=
pZD0xMTYyMDc3NTgmY2lkPXNvY2lhbF90d2l0dGVyX2FiY24/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B1=
b0d9689" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!im=
portant" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">dropped charg=
es</font></a>=C2=A0yesterday, following a request from Special Counsel Jack=
 Smith. Smith similarly moved to dismiss charges against Trump, accusing hi=
m of illegally retaining <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/3761590=
5.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmJjLmNvbS9uZXdzL2FydGljbGVzL2N4Mm40eDFwNzBybw/67=
456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf35bb4b4" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!importa=
nt;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb=
(0,0,238)">classified documents</font></a> after leaving office.=C2=A0=C2=
=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>In filings (<a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/=
37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZG9jdW1lbnRjbG91ZC5vcmcvZG9jdW1lbnRzLzI1ND=
AyNDUzLXRydW1wMTEyNQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B8f1b9693" style=3D"text-decor=
ation:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><=
font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">read here</font></a>), Smith said his vie=
w of the case remained unchanged but cited the Justice Department&#39;s lon=
g-standing legal perspective that federal prosecution of a sitting presiden=
t is unconstitutional. In the election interference case, prosecutors alleg=
ed Trump conspired to interfere with the 2020 election and obstruct the off=
icial certification of electoral votes (<a href=3D"https://link.join1440.co=
m/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb20vbmV3c2xldHRlci90cnVtcC=
1pbmRpY3RtZW50LWhlbnJpZXR0YS1sYWNrcy1hbmQtYW1lcmljYXMtYmVzdC1ob3NwaXRhbHM/6=
7456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B36ff27b8" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!import=
ant;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rg=
b(0,0,238)">see previous write-up</font></a>).</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>Charges were brought last August, with the trial delaye=
d by a legal challenge in which the Supreme Court ultimately ruled former p=
residents <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0c=
HM6Ly93d3cuc2NvdHVzYmxvZy5jb20vMjAyNC8wNy9qdXN0aWNlcy1ydWxlLXRydW1wLWhhcy1z=
b21lLWltbXVuaXR5LWZyb20tcHJvc2VjdXRpb24v/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B2fa83380"=
 style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important"=
 target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">have some immunity</f=
ont></a> to criminal prosecution for acts in office. Smith subsequently ref=
iled updated charges 10 weeks ahead of the election.=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>In related news, the president-elect =
said yesterday evening he would look to <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.co=
m/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvdHJ1bXAtdGFyaW=

67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B82a35abc" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!impor=
tant;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:r=
gb(0,0,238)">impose 25% tariffs</font></a> on all goods coming from Canada =
and Mexico and additional tariffs on Chinese goods on his first day back in=
 office.=C2=A0</span></p></div>

<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">

<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:12px;padding-right:20px;padding-bot=
tom:10px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetic=

padding:0"><span>Israel&#39;s Cabinet is=C2=A0expected to vote today on the=
 terms of a proposed=C2=A0<a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/376159=
05.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly90aGVoaWxsLmNvbS9wb2xpY3kvZGVmZW5zZS81MDA4MTY5LWNlYXNl=
ZmlyZS1kZWFsLWlzcmFlbC1oZXpib2xsYWgv/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B81820f07" sty=

get=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">ceasefire deal</font></a>=
 with Hezbollah in Lebanon.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>The deal=E2=80=94which does not cover the Israel-Hamas =
war in Gaza=E2=80=94would reportedly include a 60-day Israeli withdrawal fr=
om southern Lebanon as Hezbollah fighters move north of the Litani River (<=
a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cu=
dW5kZXJzdGFuZGluZ3dhci5vcmcvYmFja2dyb3VuZGVyL3VuZGVyc3RhbmRpbmctaXNyYWVsJUU=
yJTgwJTk5cy1jYW1wYWlnbi1kZWZlYXQtaGV6Ym9sbGFoLWxlYmFub24/67456a0c2f068d0b71=
0a8397B53256dc4" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0=
,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">see m=
ap</font></a>). The Lebanese army would monitor the border in a process ove=
rseen by five countries, led by the US and France. Israel could continue to=
 take military action to disrupt Hezbollah&#39;s ability to smuggle weapons=
 and reestablish a border presence.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>Hezbollah renewed its <a href=3D"http=
s://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2ZyLm9yZy9iYW=
NrZ3JvdW5kZXIvd2hhdC1oZXpib2xsYWg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6a6c0dbd" style=
=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" targe=
t=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">conflict with Israel</font>=
</a> on Oct. 8, 2023, launching thousands of rockets into the country follo=
wing Hamas&#39; Oct. 7 attacks. Since then, around 60,000 people have been =
displaced in Israel and more than 1 million people in Lebanon. Israeli atta=
cks in Lebanon=E2=80=94including a ground invasion this year=E2=80=94have k=
illed more than 3,500 people and wounded over 15,000 others; Hezbollah atta=
cks have killed around 140 people in Israel.</span></p></div>

<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:12px;padding-right:20px;padding-bot=
tom:10px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetic=
a Neue&quot;,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;color:rgb(0,0,0);fon=
t-weight:normal;line-height:22px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p =
style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;=
padding:0"><span>Earth=E2=80=99s temporary <a href=3D"https://link.join1440=
.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvZWFydGgtbWl=
uaS1tb29uLWFkZmIyMmZhODJhMDFkMTY4YzFiNjYzYWNmMTBlYjky/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8=
397B06f7d11a" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,23=
8)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">=E2=80=
=9Cmini moon,=E2=80=9D</font></a> a 33-foot asteroid known as 2024 PT5, is =
departing after spending two months near our planet. The space rock began i=
ts horseshoe-shaped path around Earth in late September but was never fully=
 captured as a true satellite.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>Scientists believe the bus-sized rock may be a chunk of=
 our <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly=
93d3cubGl2ZXNjaWVuY2UuY29tL3NwYWNlL2FzdGVyb2lkcy9lYXJ0aHMtbGF0ZXN0LW1pbmltb=
29uLWNvdWxkLWJlLWEtY2h1bmstb2Ytb3VyLXBsYW5ldHMtcGVybWFuZW50LW1vb24tYW5kLWl0=
cy1hYm91dC10by1sZWF2ZS11cy1iZWhpbmQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bf29edb47" styl=
e=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" targ=
et=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">own moon</font></a>=C2=A0b=
ased on its composition and characteristics, finding its makeup closely mat=
ches lunar samples collected by Russian and NASA missions in the past. The =
asteroid&#39;s spectral characteristics resemble material from the moon&#39=
;s <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9t=
YXNoYWJsZS5jb20vYXJ0aWNsZS9mYXItc2lkZS1kYXJrLW1vb24tZXhwbGFpbmVk/67456a0c2f=
068d0b710a8397Bee6732e1" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color=
:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238=
)">maria regions</font></a>=E2=80=94dark lunar areas formed by ancient lava=
 flows=E2=80=94suggesting it may have been ejected from a lunar crater mill=
ions of years ago.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>The asteroid will make a brief reappe=
arance in January, passing within 1.1 million miles of our planet=E2=80=94a=
bout five times the distance from Earth to the moon. After the flyby, it wo=
n&#39;t return until 2055.</span></p></div>

<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-=
left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;,Helv=
etica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:normal;l=
ine-height:22px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p style=3D"margin-l=
eft:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding:0"><span>=
Henry Ford said, =E2=80=9CAnyone who stops learning is old, at 20 or 80. An=
yone who keeps learning stays young.=E2=80=9D What better way to=C2=A0<a hr=
ef=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJi=
ZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmVjdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGV=
ybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW=
09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkY=
XkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397D0f828fbd" style=3D"text-=
decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_bla=
nk"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)"><strong>continue educating yourself<=
/strong></font></a>=C2=A0than by exploring the world. If you=E2=80=99re wor=
ried about the language barrier=E2=80=94meet Babbel.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>Babbel=C2=A0helps you=C2=A0<a href=3D"https://link.join=
1440.com/click/37615905.4674886/aHR0cHM6Ly9nby5iYWJiZWwuY29tL3Q_YnNjPWRpcmV=
jdHBhcnRuZXItMjAyNC1wcm9tbyZidHA9ZGVmYXVsdCZ1dG1fdGVybT1nZW5lcmljX3YxJnV0bV=
9jYW1wYWlnbj1EaXJlY3QtUGFydG5lcnNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291c=
mNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFydG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlk=
PQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397E0f828fbd" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!im=
portant;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"colo=
r:rgb(0,0,238)"><strong>start speaking a new language</strong></font></a>=
=C2=A0in just=C2=A0<em>three weeks</em>. Seriously. Things have changed a b=
it since the days of flashcards and vocab quizzes. Designed by 150 linguist=

nNoaXBzJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09cGFydG5lciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPTE0NDAmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9cGFy=
dG5lci4uYmxhY2tmcmlkYXkuLk5vdi0yMDI0JmJjbGlkPQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397F0f8=
28fbd" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!impo=
rtant" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)"><strong>make yo=
u conversational quickly</strong></font></a>. Plus, get pronunciation tips =
and cultural context for each of the 14 languages offered.=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
